data.text: @Boogie2988 NOT TO MENTION THE GREATEST GAME OF ALL BOOGIE, NINTENDO SPORTS.😂
@Boogie2988 This is going to be an expensive year 😅

@Boogie2988 I mean, Japan’s vaxxed upwards to nearly 90% of their population at this point. (I realize Nintendo has offices everywhere, but hey, it must be a lot easier than some American employees who fight tooth and nail over masks and shots.)
@biscuitbarons @DannOverboard @Boogie2988 Yes, but DL1 is local, so who knows, down the road?

@Boogie2988 Their mentality is that they can patch it later. Pokémon Go makes so much money for them that it allows them to have a fast production cycle, where the quality of the game doesn't really matter because Game Freak doesn't have the incentive to improve that much. Holiday Sales
@Boogie2988 Nah they just continued like normal just like everyone else should have done. If any studio or company uses Covid as an excuse anymore  I'm calling BS
@Boogie2988 To be fair I think they announced Bayonetta 3 40 years ago!
@Boogie2988 Putting those the switch is at end of life rumors to bed.
